content: Hi, I'm Jeff and am trying to make my first contributions. I am wondering about issues that were claimed but not resolved for extended periods. This one in particular looks like low-hanging fruit but I don't want to step on someone's toes. Is there an automated way to try to claim it or should I try to contact that person?
Maybe you can simply write a comment
Its been a pretty long time since that person claimed the bug. I would write a comment, indeed, and I wouldn't wait for a response before doing my own initial investigation.
but I would wait a day or so (or more?) before trying to override their claim
Also, I don't think its a bad idea to try to ping on zulip too, like so: @Henri E. Francois ^ ?
